   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to aigeanpy's Documentation!
====================================
Launched by the Irish Space Agency (ISA), the Aigean satellite is used to monitor water level changes around an area in Lough Ree, Ireland. This package is designed to analyse and visualise satellite-image data from the instruments on board the Aigean satellite. You will be able to obtain raw-data, meta-data, images, combine images etc.
